description: '''Crunkcore''' (also known as '''crunk punk''', '''screamo crunk''', and '''scrunk''') is a musical fusion genre characterized by the combination of musical elements from [[crunk]], [[post-hardcore]] (particularly [[pop screamo]]), [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]], [[pop music|pop]], [[electronic music|electronic]] and [[dance music]]. The genre often features [[Screaming (music)|screamed vocals]], [[hip hop music|hip hop]] beats, and sexually provocative lyrics. The genre developed from members of the [[Scene (subculture)|scene subculture]] during the mid-2000s.
